Sentencas: In hot-humid cities, conventional trigeneration can be reduced to combined cooling and power system.
Titulo: Investigation on part-load performances of combined cooling and power system primed by solid oxide fuel cell with different bottoming cycles

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell is a high-temperature prime mover with high electrical efficiency, its efficiency may be further boosted up with bottoming cycle like gas turbine, Stirling engine and organic Rankine cycle.
Titulo: Investigation on part-load performances of combined cooling and power system primed by solid oxide fuel cell with different bottoming cycles

Sentencas: Besides using waste heat recovered from the prime mover to energize absorption chiller, the surplus electricity can be used to drive the conventional compression chiller as supplement.
Titulo: Investigation on part-load performances of combined cooling and power system primed by solid oxide fuel cell with different bottoming cycles

Sentencas: However, there is little knowledge about the effectiveness of such combined cooling and power system under different operating conditions.
Titulo: Investigation on part-load performances of combined cooling and power system primed by solid oxide fuel cell with different bottoming cycles

Sentencas: System models with various bottoming cycles are therefore developed, and their part-load performances are investigated.
Titulo: Investigation on part-load performances of combined cooling and power system primed by solid oxide fuel cell with different bottoming cycles

Sentencas: The effects of fuel inlet temperature and current density of fuel cell stack; compression ratio of gas turbine; Stirling engine type; working fluid of organic Rankine cycle; and fuel cell stack part-load ratio are explored.
Titulo: Investigation on part-load performances of combined cooling and power system primed by solid oxide fuel cell with different bottoming cycles

Sentencas: It is found that the combined cooling and power system with bottoming cycles of gas turbine and Stirling engine have higher boost of electrical efficiency.
Titulo: Investigation on part-load performances of combined cooling and power system primed by solid oxide fuel cell with different bottoming cycles

Sentencas: Gas turbine bottoming cycle is recommended when building energy demands are relatively constant, while Stirling engine bottoming cycle is suggested for variable energy demands.
Titulo: Investigation on part-load performances of combined cooling and power system primed by solid oxide fuel cell with different bottoming cycles
